name: t03_header_dominant
description: Substantial logic in headers (data structures, operations). The dominant DWARF file for many functions will be the .h, not the .c. Pressures MULTI_FILE_RANGE.
oracle_pressure: Large static inline functions in header: dominant file will be .h not .c. At O1+ expect RANGES_FRAGMENTED as header code is inlined into multiple TUs. MULTI_FILE_RANGE expected when call sites in .c pull in header line ranges
